resources.string: Failed to close floating button window
Allow SoftPowerButton to draw over your apps to be enable display a floating easy access button.
SoftPowerButton device admin implementation to enable an instant screen lock feature.
This permission needs to be granted to enable SoftPowerButton initiate lock screen when you ask it to. Please ignore the danger warning afterwards. This app is safe and open source.
Device admin permission rejected. SoftPowerButton will not be able to lock screen on command. SoftPowerButton will not be able to lock screen on command. Close the floating button to request again.
SoftPowerButton accessibility service to enable it perform an accessibility action
Are you sure you want to restart phone?
Power menu couldn\'t be shown because the app\'s accessibility service is not enabled.
Overlay permission rejected. SoftPowerButton will not be able to show on the screen.
To show the power menu for restart, etc, enable accessibility service for this app.
Accessibility service for SoftPowerButton needs to be enabled to be able to show power menu, lock screen and listen to volume keys
If you are on the accessibility settings page, go to \'More downloaded services\' or \'Downloaded apps\' and locate SoftPowerButton. Click on it and enable it\'s accessibility service.
Failed to close floating dialog window.
Enable accessibility service for SoftPowerButton in order to lock screen.
Enable accessibility service for SoftPowerButton to show power menu for restart.
Stop accessibility service to enable you uninstall the app.

Welcome to the SoftPowerButton guide.


SoftPowerButton offers all the functionalities of your real power button whether it's broken or not.
This means you can do all the things you used to do with your real power button using this app.

 The functionalities includes:

 1. Sleep/Lock your phone screen by clicking the floating button once.

 2. Show the power menu to access the reboot button and others by long pressing on the floating button.

 3. Wake up the phone by clicking on your volume buttons.

 4. Easily access these features anywhere with the floating widget and tray notification.

 5. Easily access these features from your locked screen using the lock screen notification.

 6. Take screenshots by clicking on the floating button twice.

 Note: If your phone powered off and your real power button is broken, you can start the app by pressing both volume buttons while you insert a USB cable into it's port at the same time. The phone's recovery menu will be shown to you. Use the volume button to navigate to 'Reboot' and wait or just wait for the phone to put it in reboot mode. After a while your phone will automatically reboot itself.


 Other Instructions


 1. To close or hide the floating power button, drag the button unto the white close icon.

 2. To uninstall the app, click on 'Stop all' in the notification or long press app icon to reveal a shortcut to click on. After this, try to uninstall.
App is now ready to uninstall.
